nodes.text: The Kardava system was a star system that was located within the Sevastol sector, a part of the galactic regions known as the Mid Rim and the Slice. It was the origin point of the group known as Kardavan penitents, whose membership included individuals of the Human species.
The Kardava system was established in the StarWars.com Online Companion to the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, which placed the system in grid square P-14.
